description: Detects suspicious use of XORDump process memory dumping utility Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Another tool that uses the command line switches of XORdump
name: XORDump Use
query: (process.executable:*\\xordump.exe OR process.command_line:(*\ \-process\ lsass.exe\ * OR *\ \-m\ comsvcs\ * OR *\ \-m\ dbghelp\ * OR *\ \-m\ dbgcore\ *))
